project.name: C-C088B-WIRE-03-ST03-DT06-DF14-CF24-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C088B-WIRE-03-ST03-DT06-DF14-CF24-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file This weakness takes a filename from an untrusted source and uses a subprocess (via popen) to perform a search and replace of the text "hello" with "Hello". The untrusted input is not properly sanitized, and may be used to perform an argument injection on the base command in order to run additional commands or functions.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C088B-WIRE-03-ST03-DT06-DF14-CF24-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: This weakness takes a filename from an untrusted source and uses a subprocess (via popen) to perform a search and replace of the text "hello" with "Hello". The untrusted input is not properly sanitized, and may be used to perform an argument injection on the base command in order to run additional commands or functions.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="--cmd 'silent !cat /etc/passwd' /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/vim_inputs/sample1.txt" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_OEc1daBLhcQvpoSi4yNq AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (etc_passwd_line_pattern_MqkREmbKQ1 OR etc_passwd_root_user_k8zuIsyL9I OR ls_output_mx2OszAoVj) AND NOT timeout_Ib2oj3TYhS) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((etc_passwd_line_pattern_MqkREmbKQ1 OR etc_passwd_root_user_k8zuIsyL9I OR ls_output_mx2OszAoVj) OR timeout_Ib2oj3TYhS OR controlled_exit_oPyd0Z86W6)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (etc_passwd_line_pattern_MqkREmbKQ1 OR etc_passwd_root_user_k8zuIsyL9I OR ls_output_mx2OszAoVj) AND NOT timeout_Ib2oj3TYhS) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((etc_passwd_line_pattern_MqkREmbKQ1 OR etc_passwd_root_user_k8zuIsyL9I OR ls_output_mx2OszAoVj) OR timeout_Ib2oj3TYhS OR controlled_exit_oPyd0Z86W6))
